document.full_text: libyan deputy foreign minister abdelati obeidi flew to greece sunday to deliver a message from libyan leader muammar gaddafi to the greek prime minister, a senior government official told reuters.
document.title: libya official in athens to convey gaddafi message
lines_and_colors: libyan deputy foreign minister abdelati obeidi flew to greece sunday to deliver a message from libyan leader muammar gaddafi to the greek prime minister, a senior government official told reuters.
